info.name: Herbalist Background
info.description: Background for a character interested in herbs and herbal remedies

description.p: Picking herbs from a backyard garden, a hot house, or a forest outside of town the herbalist collects natural items that aid and harm. An herbalist can heal, poison, invigorate. They know the powers of plants and fungi to change how humanoids and beasts experience the world. They learn Druidic language even if they shouldn't be allowed.

ul.li: Equipment: Sickle (obsidian if the character is not allowed to usse metal), 2 candles, Scroll case with 5 pieces parchment or a notebook, common clothes, component pouch, herbalist kit, 2 vials (1 with either antitoxin or healing potion).

select.name: Personal history
select.item: I saved people during a famine/draught.
I offered refuge to wounded animals.
A celestial, fey, or similar creature gave me knwoledge on rare herbs.
I was the only one in my village/community to listen to women and help them with health issues.
I could not formally study, but I learnt from an older herbalist.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: I like animals and plants more than people. I'm always ready to poison someone to protect nature.
I don't like starting fights, I always think twice before attacking anybody.
I never underestimate others, all people have hidden talents.
People are just another type of animal, that's why I don't consider myself superior to other animals.
I always listen to opinions of others, even if they don't know what they're talking about.
I believe that every wound should be tended to, even if it's an enemy.
I consider the laws of nature the only real authority.

select.name: Bond
select.item: Tribe is everything to me.
My family made me into who i am today, i will always be thankful to them.
I consider my sisters/brothers herbalists my only family.
I lost everybody who I cared about... now I'm trying to find anybody who will care about me.
I'm looking for new faces and stories, everybody have something to tell.
I want everyone to know my name and for my legacy to live on even hundred years later.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I think bad omens can predict future, I always believe them.
I'm the worst at navigation, if people say "go right", I will go left.
I sleep like a dead man, nothing can wake me up... sometimes I think even getting stabbed will not awake me.
I easily distract and lose focus on the mission.
I don't care about other people's feelings, it's their problem not mine.
I have seen too many injustices, I have a hard time trusting people.

element.name: Feature: A Dash of This, a Dollop of That

description.p: Once per long rest you can find the various fungi, plants, and natural ingredients needed to make a concoction that can be employed as antitoxin, lesser cure, weak poison, tranquilizer or energizer.
The resulting poultice has a shelf life of only 8h unless bottled, if bottled it stays effective for maximum 48h.

ul.li: Antitoxin:A creature that ingests the poultice gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.

li.strong: Lesser healing: if applied on a wound it stops bleeding and the character recovers 1 HP immediately; if ingested the character will recover maximum from the next hit die rolled within 1 minute.

ul.li: Weak poison:A creature that touches or ingests the poultice must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 1d4 poison damage. On each successive failed save, the character takes 1 poison damage. After 1 successful save, the poison effect ends. This poison can be applied on weapons, the effect of the poison apply to targets hit with the weapon in the following ten rounds.

Tranquilizer:A creature that ingests the poultice or is hit with a weapon tainted with it must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or suffer a -1 Dexterity point for 10 rounds, if the saving throw is failed by 5 or more, the creature will also have disadvantage on Constitution and Dexterity saving throws for 10 rounds.
Energizer:Reduces one level of exhaustion for 1 hour.
